content: circular needles put your 72 provisional cast on stitches onto them 2 lay your cowl lengthwise in front of you to put the twist you will take the short end on your right holding the other end keeping it flat and rotate the right hand side flipping it over you now have your twist should look like a long bow tie 3 fold your 2 ends to meet in the center you will need to adjust the provisional cast on stitches so that both needles line up and they are both on the same side facing the same direction this will help when working the kitchener stitch 4 begin to graft the 72 sts from each side together using the kitchener stitch or your favorite grafting method hide all loose end and lightly block regular cast on join bobble all stitches lay your work flat lengthwise in front of you flip the right side over putting a twist in the center fold your 2 ends to meet the center and graft them together using your favorite grafting method making sure to match stitch for stitch on each end hide all loose ends and lightly block should you have any questions please send them to pattern help unrulystitch@gmail com feel free to use the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes on instagram or facebook of your works in progress and finish pieces mb make bobble instagram https //www instagram com/unrulystitch knit front and back 2 times into next stitch then knit into front one more time turn ravelry
